first_interaction.speaker: Jack
first_interaction.text: Magandang araw! Ako si PO3 Jack. May maitutulong ba ako sa'yo ngayon?

first_interaction.speaker: Jack
first_interaction.text: Kung may nakita kang kakaibang nangyayari, ipaalam mo agad para maagapan natin.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Jack
repeated_interaction.text: Oh, ikaw pala ulit! Ligtas naman ba ang lakad mo ngayon?

repeated_interaction.speaker: Jack
repeated_interaction.text: Sabihin mo lang kung may concern ka pa. Nandito lang kami para tumulong.
